extension_desc.message: Sends TradingView.com alerts into Telegram/Discord/MT4/MT5/FXTS2 as orders, alerts or channel posts

local_bot_desc.message: Your own bot run on your PC. This feature is in closed beta. You can ask for an access via info@profitrobots.com

purchase_button.description: Caption of the button in the options

license_button.description: Caption of the button in the options

save_button.description: Caption of the button in the options

test_button.description: Caption of the button in the options

add_button.description: Caption of the button in the options

KeyLimitIsHit.message: Your current licence doesn't allow you to use so many keys

key_key_info.message:
The key should look like this: 't-123456789:t00000'.
You can get Telegram key by starting a conversation with our Telegram Bot. Read this article for more details.
To get the Dicord key write something to our Discord bot. Read this article for more details.
You can watch how to use bots here.

To send the alert using a specific key just start the alert text using '[your_key_id]Your alert text'. The alert will be sent using all keys if no '[your_key_id]' is specified. You can read how to use the filtering here.

custom_format_desc.message: You can use the next templates: {{symbol}} for the symbol/ticker, {{timeframe}} for the timeframe/period and {{message}} for the message itself.

use_beta_label.message: Use experimental features. May case issues with execution

NoFilterIgnoreMessage.message: No filter is specified in the message. Ignoring this message.

LicenseUpdateFail.message: Error retreiving list of purchased products.

TestSuccess.message: Key is valid. Don't forget to save.

doesnt_work_step_1.message: Please, make sure that you refreshed the TradingView page after installing this extension.

doesnt_work_step_2.message: If you still can't get alerts from the TradingView let us know:

manual_on_youtube.message: You can watch manuals on our

add_alert_1.message: Strategies in TradingView can't throw alerts. You need to convert your strategy into the study.

add_alert_2.message: Usually, you can do it by replacing strategy.* methods with alertcondition(...). For example, strategy like this:

add_alert_4.message: Or you can ask us to convert your strategy into the study. Send us the code of your strategy to

add_alert_5.message: and we will send a study with alerts back.

KeyIdDoNotMatch.message: Key id do not match specified in the alert.

add_alert.message: How to add an alert into your strategy

free_limit_hit.message: The limit of messages per hour is hit (free version).

account_status_login.description: Caption of the button on the main page

trial_ended.message: Your trial period has ended. You need to buy this extension in order to use it. The free version is limited to 1 alert per hour.

key_info_set.message: You need to set the key in the options (you can get it by starting a conversation with @profit_robots_bot Telegram bot or our Discord bot)

alerts_status_fail.message: No TradingView tabs found. Refresh TradingView tab or open a new one

external_execution.message: Also, you can ask for an access for a MetaTrader 4 order execution beta. It'll allow you to send orders from TradingView to MetaTrader 4.

no_filter_ignore_checked.message: If the "Ignore messages without filter specified" option is checked then this message will be ignored. This is a good way to filter out messages which you don't want to send it via this extension (for example - AutoView messages).
no_filter_ignore_checked.description: Label in the filter samples page

no_filter_ignore_unchecked.message: If the "Ignore messages without filter specified" option is unchecked then this message will be sent using all targets.
no_filter_ignore_unchecked.description: Label in the filter samples page

filter_sample_all.message: This message will be sent to all targets.
filter_sample_all.description: Label in the filter samples page

filter_sample_custom.message: This message will be sent to the target with id "me". You can specify several id's separated with a comma:
